email_body: -----Original Message----- From: Polsky, Phil Sent: Wednesday, October 24, 2001 7:57 AM To: Grigsby, Mike Subject: Summary for Grigsby.xls MIke, Attached is the updated summary regarding expansions in the west. There is only one change - PGT 2003 expansion. The expansion has now dropped from 230,000 MM/d to 160,000 MM/d due to PPL dropping out. Let me know if you need anything else. Phil
